title: Oil Extends Decline With Focus on US-Iran Nuclear Negotiations
description: Oil extended its biggest one-day drop in three weeks, with planned talks between Iran and the US later on Friday easing the immediate risk of military conflict and supply disruptions.
content: Oil extended its biggest one-day drop in three weeks, with planned talks between Iran and the US later on Friday easing the immediate risk of military conflict and supply disruptions.
